subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: The men’s lacrosse program at Duke University, shut down in the spring after an incident that resulted in the indictment of three players on rape charges, moved forward with the hiring of John Danowski as coach.
snippet: The men’s lacrosse program at Duke University, shut down in the spring after an incident that resulted in the indictment of three players on rape charges, moved forward with the hiring of John Danowski as coach.
